text: The irony: NYT et al risk helping Trump and Putin. By feeding the taunts ("witch hunt" etc). And by keeping the op running on after-burner.
First the “MSM” were way behind the evidence; now they risk getting ahead of the evidence.
By expecting some dark secret to come out. By hunting for elusive collusion. By talking up the Muller investigation — and Putin’s power.
Now “the President’s Reporters” are over-compensating.
The result was that the leaked material became the big story
